name: Dice Dots
description:
Is it just me or unbalanced clickers are fun?

You know... When you leave the game idle only to come back after a week and see that you can buy everything ten times over. 

It's basically the first minute of gameplay before the upgrades become too expensive, but the upgrades never become too expensive in this game.

Description

You begin by clicking a button. With those clicks you can buy a roll of the dice which earns you dice dots. With those you can buy upgrades... Whatever! You''ll understand. Just start clicking!
